name: Nova Star (L8BOOm3r)
description:
Nova Star - GameDevHQ Certification Submission. 

Use a,s,w,d keys (or arrows) to navigate. Esc to pause. The ship will auto fire when in front of an enemy.

Just about at the 5 day (calendar time) limit so this is my submission with absolutely no polish or tuning.

3/28/21 6:51 PM - posted an updated with health reporting.
